DOC.brief_summary: This study determine effectiveness MK0777 GEM versus Lorazepam treatment patient generalize anxiety disorder . This early phase trial specific protocol information progress publicly available time . ( Full information available trial participant ) .
DOC.brief_title: GEM 1.5 mg b.i.d . 4.5 mg b.i.d . Versus Lorazepam GAD ( 0777-026 )
